Class Client

java.lang.Object
com.onlinepayments.ApiResource
com.onlinepayments.Client
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientInterface, LoggingCapable, ObfuscationCapable, Closeable, AutoCloseable
public class Client extends ApiResource implements ClientInterface
Base class of all Online Payments platform API resources.
